title: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart in the Land of Demons

sources.title: Lone Wolf And Cub: 5 - Baby Cart In The Land Of Demons
sources.description: Balancing physical action with Buddhist musings on life and death, the most spiritual of the  Lone Wolf and Cub  films finds Ogami’s combat skills put to the test by five different warrior-messengers.

metadata.Plot: Fifth film in the Lone Wolf & Cub Series. 5 warriors challenge Ogami to duels. Each has 1/5th of Ogami's assassin fee and 1/5 of the information he needs to complete his assassination. His mission is to kill a mad Daimyo before he destroys his clan!
metadata.Actors: Tomisaburô Wakayama, Michiyo Yasuda, Akihiro Tomikawa
